tequila.name: 1800 Tequila Blanco
tequila.description: Bright water-white; on the nose 1800 Tequila Blanco has a distinct smoke and spice aroma with notes of crushed herb and cedar; on the palate 1800 Tequila Blanco is dry with a warming sensation and flavors of sweet cedar, smoke and pear. Best-selling 100% agave, super- premium tequila, 1800® follows the original formula created in the year 1800. The 1800® brand boasts Silver, Coconut, Reposado, Añejo, Milenio and Cristalino varieties. This range allows tequila novices and connoisseurs to experience the double-distilled cleanness of silver and nuanced aged tequilas.

tequila.name: 1800 Tequila Silver
tequila.description: Double distilled, a special selection of white tequilas are blended together for added complexity and character. Bright water-white; on the nose there is a distinct smoke and spice aroma with notes of crushed herb and cedar; on the palate 1800 Blanco Tequila is dry with a warming sensation and flavors of sweet cedar, smoke and pear.

tequila.name: 1800 Tequila Reposado
tequila.description: Mexico – This moderately full-bodied gold tequila is smooth with butterscotch, vanilla and toasted coconut flavors. The oak barrel aging process allows for a sweet then dry well rounded finish.

tequila.name: 1800 Tequila Gold
tequila.description: Tequila Reserva 1800 Anejo is 100% de Agave, double distilled, and aged in French oak and American Oak for 6 months. 1800 Reposado is exceptionally smooth with a soft Agave taste.

tequila.name: 1800 Cristalino Anejo
tequila.description: Mexico- Designed to be sipped...it has aromas of vanilla, caramel and toasted wood, followed by flavors of honey, agave, and oak. Filtration has given this tequila an extra-smooth mouthfeel and created a greater balance between the flavors from the agave and those from its oak aging.

tequila.name: Adictivo Tequila Doble Reposado
tequila.description: Mexico - Tequila Adictivo Reposado is 100% pure Blue Agave, bright straw color, with a soft and refined taste and aromas of wood and cooked agave Awarded Silver and Bronze Medal 2017 & 2018 San Diego Spirits Festival.
